snippet.title: "Welcome to Noiramore Academy" Cinematic Trailer 🕵️‍♀️ [Mystery Adventure Indie Game]
snippet.description:
WISHLIST ON STEAM: https://store.steampowered.com/app/2529410/Noiramore_Academy/
On the cold planet of Noivesse lies a school with a dark and storied history called Noiramore Academy. Judith Hovern, one of the talented students attending this institution, is a troubled but wickedly smart student who has an interest in discovering the forbidden secrets of the school. When one of the new teachers is violently kidnapped during the night, and Judith is the only witness, she must use her wit, powers, and puzzle-solving skills to illuminate the identity of the culprit and save the school.

Noiramore Academy is a 3D puzzle adventure game. Solve brain-teasing puzzles, explore the storied halls of the school, talk with interesting characters, and unlock the secret of the mystery plaguing the school. We are currently developing the game with a plan to have a Kickstarter and free demo for the game later this year!

Check out our devlog playlist:
https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLIZ1KgoI8wPBg7GEZyKE5lxQ4d3V94PIw

Narration by Laura Key

The Fantastic Kitty Rue is available now on Steam:
 https://store.steampowered.com/app/2126630/The_Fantastic_Kitty_Rue/

Check out Liberty Belle on Steam:
https://store.steampowered.com/app/1376110/Liberty_Belle/  

WEBSITE:
https://inkroseinc.com/

Patreon: 
https://www.patreon.com/inkrose 

MY ETSY STORE:
https://www.etsy.com/shop/InkRoseInc


Special thanks to my Patrons! 
Cheesecakeczar
